p: Based on 12 studies identified from 155 TND publications providing 63 VE FLU− estimates, 62 VE ORV+ estimates, and 33 VE PAN− estimates, we did not find any statistical differences in VE by type of control group. The paired t test assessing vaccination coverage also did not demonstrate any difference by choice of control group. Although we observed a ΔVE FLU−,ORV+ less than zero reported in 1 study, the difference was not consistently observed in each season ( 35). The pooled ΔVE FLU−,ORV+ estimate for 21 pairs of observations was –4% (95% CI: –10, 2), suggesting that the choice of control group is unlikely to significantly affect VE estimated using the TND.
